sentences.en: As a crosscheck, the economists also used the 2005 Urban Labour Survey of five big cities.
sentences.cn: 经济学家们还运用了2005年五大城市的城市劳动力调查来核对和验证.

sentences.en: He says it's OK, but I'll just crosscheck that with them.
sentences.cn: 他说这就可以了, 但我还要同他们再核查一下.

sentences.en: If backup is on disk, then CROSSCHECK determines whether the header of the file is valid.
sentences.cn: 如果备份在磁盘上, 那么CROSSCHECK命令检测文件头是否合法.

sentences.en: You are also ready to crosscheck any guidance that you hear telepathically.
sentences.cn: 你也准备好交叉测试你心灵感应所听到的任何引导了.

trans.tran_cn: （以不同的方法）核对（计算结果等），核查
